title: China Petroleum & Chemical Corp. 3Q Net Profit Slipped 35%
text:
By Yifan Wang

China Petroleum & Chemical Corp. (600028.SH), better known as Sinopec, said its third-quarter net profit dropped 35% amid lower global oil prices and intensified competition in China's refined-oil market.

Net profit for the third quarter was 11.94 billion yuan ($1.69 billion), compared with CNY18.38 billion in the year-ago period, the company said Wednesday.

Revenue for the quarter fell 5.0% to CNY734.31 billion, it said.

For the first nine months of the year, net profit fell 28% to CNY43.28 billion, Sinopec said.

Write to Yifan Wang at yifan.wang@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 30, 2019 05:37 ET (09:37 GMT)
